column4: Help: can anyone talk to me about burning disks from Ubuntu - the interface and actions are a tad confusing thanks.
do you want to burn an image or your own project?
Hi I am finding that it 'appears' you can drag and drop to the DVD files
currently its saying writing files to DVD
now its come up with a write error. It actually seems that it cannot write to DVD without using a utility like Brasero or similar?
go to add/remove and install brasero
yea, Ive done that, but the stupid this is that it seems you can drag and drop files using Konqueror but it actually does not work that way.
eg If I drop the files they appear on the DVD directory immediately with a [burn file] button on the screen
I don't use KDE. Why don't you use brasero's own interface? That's how I do it?
when I use brasero interface it just sits there creating a checksum till I reboot.
Just used K3B and thats working but it sure was a lazy start - took ages to start writing disk
could you please be more specific?
Hi I go to home and can see the other user account I set up. I want to modify their .thunderbird contents but it says I dont have permission
I thought since I log in as admin that would give me permission?
what do you mean admin? You're logged in as root?
yep
actually, probably not I will have to check I log in as my own name but I set everything up so assumed I was admin.
you mean your user is root? If so, you SHOULD be able to do whatever you please. Is /home mounted as read-only?
no you are right I am logged in as Alistair, but not as root. Thanks kindly.
no problem. Glad to help
but with grub you can start windows. ALso, you can access your windows files from grub
